Text: FW Analyst Associate Lunch with Ken Lay Greg Whalley and Mark FrevertOriginal Message From Wells Tori L On Behalf Of Lay Kenneth Sent Thursday October AM To Bass Eric Dyar Teresa Fuller Robert Kulkarni Vikram Masani Zal Mulholland Sarah Tellis Claude Wagner Joseph Woolcock Adrian Benke Shelia Chen Will Cohen Brian Hernandez Alex Tefel Maria Rorschach Reagan Willis Erin Cc Frevert Mark Whalley Greg Lemmons Jr Billy Fleming Rosalee Daw Nicki Taylor Liz Levingston Maxine E Subject Analyst Associate Lunch with Ken Lay Greg Whalley and Mark Frevert Dear All I would like to invite you to join Greg Whalley Mark Frevert Billy Lemmons and me for lunch on Wednesday December at pm in the M Dining Room You have been selected for this lunch because of your outstanding performance in the Associate Analyst Program This will be an opportunity for us to get to know you and to visit on an informal basis We will discuss current events related to Enron our Vision for Becoming the Worlds Leading Company and entertain any questions you might have for us Please RSVP to Maxine Levingston via email at mailto or at x by November I look forward to seeing you on December Best regards Ken

Analyst Associate Program eSpeak Invitation from Billy Lemmons Cc PST I just wanted to take a moment to personally invite each of you to participate in the eSpeak session this Thursday May at am CDT If you have questions that youd like to submit in advance you can do so by visiting eSpeak on the Enron homepage I also wanted to take this opportunity to provide you with an update on whats happening within the Program Since assuming my new role at the beginning of April Ive been focusing my efforts on meeting with Enrons business unit leaders and with as many Analysts and Associates as possible These activities underscore my priorities in managing the Program a very strong alignment with Enrons businesses and frequent informal communication Some of the specific items that were focused on as a result of your feedback and that will be communicated in coming weeks include improvements to the PRC process which are in the final stages of development with the business units recruiting goals and strategies for the recruiting season a series of floor meetings beginning today to visit informally with participants in the Program an updated social schedule that places a priority on interaction among Analysts and Associates as well as with the business leaders of Enron Im excited that Traci Warner and Ted Bland have joined our team in the Western Hemisphere to lead Recruiting and Career Development respectively Together they bring almost years of Enron business unit experience and in the case of Traci experience as an Associate in the Program Anna Jansson continues to do an outstanding job leading the Eastern Hemisphere Program and has been an great source of new ideas When I joined Enron in there were about Analysts and Associates combined sitting in one group on the th floor Today we have over future Innovators and Leaders of Enron in offices around the world This Program has been and will continue to be our most important source of new talent Im very proud to have been asked to take this role and I look forward to working with each of you Billy Lemmons
